summary: Implements internal utilities for CuPy's operation fusion system, generating CUDA kernel source for elementwise and reduction computations. It handles type inference, index preparation, parameter setup, and assembles code fragments for fused kernels, including support for user-defined ufunc routines.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance array processing by fusing multiple operations into a single GPU kernel, minimizing memory transfers and kernel launch overhead to accelerate scientific and data‑analytics workloads.
